title: Online Dating web app.
description: Online dating app where user can search their match partner using desire filters like I am interested in gender, age, and location. Also, they can like and chat with each other.

contents.title: Bringing it together 1
contents.description:
Teachers needed a better way to create collaborative group activities by annotating slides on Slice. Before starting this project, a layer could only be annotated by a single user, making it difficult for learners to work together. 
 Our solution was to allow users to be invited to a layer, where they can see others’ annotations and make their own.

contents.title: Bringing it together 2
contents.description:
Teachers needed a better way to create collaborative group activities by annotating slides on Slice. Before starting this project, a layer could only be annotated by a single user, making it difficult for learners to work together. 
 Our solution was to allow users to be invited to a layer, where they can see others’ annotations and make their own.

gallery.caption: Ultracuid Dating app Home page.
Talk with each others.
gallery.description: Customer can talk with each others using the chat feature.

gallery.caption: Find your match
gallery.description: Customers can find their partner by age, gender interest and location filters.

gallery.caption: Send a like request.
gallery.description: Customer can like others profile and they can see their liked profile, other liked the customer profile and mutual like profiles.

gallery.caption: Freemium plan
gallery.description: Customer can send maximum 5 messages daily for the free, if customer want to send a new message they have to purcahse a subscription plan.

title: VentPack for anonymous user to post and get resolve from personal problems.
description: VentPack is the way to send your personal problem post anonymously, other people comment, like, share, bookmark on your post, if they both become friend, both can message and much more..

title: Live customer care chat.
description:
Live customer care chat, customer can ask a question one by one, using customer panel user can ask a question, and if another customer wants to ask a question, he has to be in queue until seller serves the query of customer1. The seller has the authority to end the conversation with the customer and serve another customer likewise...
NOTE: the web app UI is compitible with mobile version only.

title: Threelly, The YouTube video time range benchmarker, The Chrome Extension.
description: Millions of YouTube videos length is 30m+, the slice of the video feature benchmark the time range so end user get directly play the portion and save their time. Also added AI-driven auto slice index feature, which allows content creators auto slice the video.
